name: Beats Working
description:
Brian is sick of his job. The pointless meetings, the endless emails, the constant drudgery.  He's sick and tired of doing his blue sky thinking outside the box going forward. One day he decides enough is enough. He has to get out of there. Because all he really cares about... is the music.

Controls

W - high attack

D - low attack

UP - jump

DOWN - slide
